actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure in lieu of S.731, S.732.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Lugar. With written report No. 99-51.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 127.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original bill to amend the Arms Control and Disarmament Act to authorize supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year 1985 and to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1986 and 1987 for the Arms Control and Disarmament Agency, and for other purposes.
short_title: Arms Control and Disarmament Amendments Act of 1985

summary.text: Arms Control and Disarmament Amendments Act of 1985 - Amends the Arms Control and Disarmament Act to authorize supplemental appropriations for FY 1985 to carry out such Act. Earmarks a specified amount for expenses incurred in connection with arms control negotiations with the Soviet Union. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1986 and 1987 to carry out such Act. Earmarks a specified amount for expenses incurred in connection with arms control negotiations with the Soviet Union. Directs the President to report annually to the Congress on the adherence of the United States to obligations undertaken in arms control agreements and on any problems related to compliance by other nations with arms control agreements. Sets forth information to be included in such report.

titles.title: Arms Control and Disarmament Amendments Act of 1985

An original bill to amend the Arms Control and Disarmament Act to authorize supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year 1985 and to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1986 and 1987 for the Arms Control and Disarmament Agency, and for other purposes.
